review_blob: I got this in a mix pack of 6 from the LCBO. I poured it, liked the color, smelled sort of okay, and then took one drink and without hesitation dumped the rest of the beer down the drain. I like ginger beer (like a strong ginger ale), but this as a regular beer with ginger added to it made the beer taste like it was moldy. Ugh. Thank goodness there was another beer in the fridge cold already. I got a fresh glass, poured the new beer, and saved my palate from this awful brew.
beer_name: Granville Island Ginja Ninja Ginger Beer
